title: 170. Andy & DJ CTI: Pfizer Criminals, Boys In Girls Restrooms & Falling Dominos
itunes:title: 170. Andy & DJ CTI: Pfizer Criminals, Boys In Girls Restrooms & Falling Dominos
description: Where do we draw the line? In today's episode, Andy & DJ talk about the CEO of Pfizer labeling people who spread misinformation about the vaccine as criminals, school districts allowing young boys into girls' restrooms, and Michael Sussmann's indictment of allegedly lying to the FBI.
content:encoded: Where do we draw the line? In today's episode, Andy & DJ talk about the CEO of Pfizer labeling people who spread misinformation about the vaccine as criminals, school districts allowing young boys into girls' restrooms, and Michael Sussmann's indictment of allegedly lying to the FBI.
